name: Red: The beginning of the Melody
storyline: The main character, Mika, in order to recall her parents’ self-consciousness, signed in a project called reD. The reD official claimed that completing the tasks assigned by the organization could realize her dreams. But the detailed tasks were fairly questionable.
summary: In this mystery game you follow Mika through many puzzles. The storyline has multiple endings for games to unlock, some of which would potentially influence the following creating of the Second Dimension.
